Activating Microsoft Windows 8 Pro for free with legitimate key!!!!
Yes you heard it right, its possible now just follow some of these simple steps:

1). Activate your copy of windows with a MAK or KMS method
2). To activate windows using KMS server, run Command Prompt (CMD) as Admin
and enter the following in the given order:
slmgr /ipk NG4HW-VH26C-733KW-K6F98-J8CK4
slmgr /skms 147.134.1.42:1688
slmgr.vbs -ato
slmgr /ckms
If the server is running then you will be activated for 180 days.
3). Visit http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-8/feature-packs and get
your legit free key for an upgrade to Windows 8 Pro with Windows Media Center.
4). Now right click on extreme lower left corner of your screen and go to "System".
5). Click on "Get more features with a new edition of Windows" and
select "I already have a product key", enter the key and follow
the procedure to make your Windows legitimately activated!

NOTE:
1). Free upgrade offer is valid till 31 January 2013, so hurry up!!
2). This method works only with Windows 8 Pro Retail.

If I am right, and I think I am, build 9200 IS THE Release-To-Marketing (RTM) version, which is, in fact, THE FINAL VERSION. There is no such thing as an "official final version" or "official retail version" whatsoever, because build 9200, or the RTM, is the final version that is sold to the markets. In short, I think this is what everyone is looking for.

Do NOT use the activator included in this torrent.  Research KMS activation instead.  This 'hack'tivator doesn't actually do anything.  It just modifies a few system files in order to appear as though your copy is activated, when in reality it is not.  Who knows what else this thing is doing.

If you don't believe me, then try this simple test.  Any normal activator does NOT need to modify your system files in any way to activate windows.  After using it, open your command prompt as administrator and type the following command:

sfc /scannow

It will scan the system and show you that system files were corrupt.  This is from that activator.

Ok, got this to work. A few pointers before I give a guide is that I wiped my external HDD with XP and left win 7 on my external for testing purposes. I DID NOT USE THE PATCH INCLUDED HERE. I used the patch from this up http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7786020/Windows_8_AIO_16-in-1_(Final_Build_9200)___Permanent_Activator (as a side note, when downloading this torrent, make sure you click skip for all the other crap except for the activator).

Step 1: After download finishes, burn iso to DVD using isoburn or whatever tool suits your needs (I set the burn speed to 2x. The slower the better as there's less chance that something will get spazzed during the burn process).

Step 2: After burn, insert DVD and wait for autorun to start. After that follow instructions and install (When it gets to the part about what installation type you want, click custom install as this will do a clean install, rather than an upgrade. Or at least, that's what I did).

Step 3: Wait for installation to finish. This may take a while. I took about an hour for it to install for me.

Step 4: After installation has completed, find the folder with your activator. Click on install/uninstall and follow the CMD prompts.

Presto! You should have a fully activated Windows 8.

As a side note (again): If you cannot personalize your settings, you'll need to run the fix included in the link i pasted earlier. I didn't need to use the fix, but it's there in case you all need it (i take no credit for the uploads on the other page or this one as neither are my work).

Thanks to the uploaders for their hard work. Really appreciate Bros/Brodettes.

Let me know if you guys/gals need help. I'll check back periodically to assist.
Oh, and this is the real deal. I have already installed windows media center (which is not included in the os) using the key generated by the activator.

For those having difficulty installing this on their system, Windows 8 is NOT compatible with ALL PC CONFIGURATIONS. Research before you install, otherwise you waste your own time downloading this only to find out you can't even run it with your PC config.
